column9: I was put on Tiazac for high blood pressure and a hyper left ventricle.  Tiazac has worked immensely in lowering my heart rate.  It use to be 150 beats per minute now it is 80 -100 beat per minute which is normal.  I am studying to be an LPN so I want my heart to be in good condition and last a good many years!

column9: I had slight ankle swelling but excellent results. It slowed my heart rate down too low. After about 8 yrs., I just quit taking it as it would not let my heart rate go up during exercise.
